HOME_DELIVERY.pricing: €3.19 for orders up to €40. Free for orders over €40.
HOME_DELIVERY.delivery_time: 1-2 business days. For remote islands, delivery can take 3-5 business days.

weekend_delivery.days: Deliveries are made Monday to Friday.

HOME_DELIVERY.island_surcharge: No surcharge mentioned. Delivery to all islands is available via GLS according to their schedule, or via Hrvatska pošta for islands not on the GLS schedule. Delivery time is longer (3-5 business days).

BULKY_PRODUCT_HOME_DELIVERY.pricing: Bulky items are delivered via GLS and follow standard home delivery pricing: €3.19 for orders up to €40, free for orders over €40. They cannot be delivered to BoxNow lockers.
BULKY_PRODUCT_HOME_DELIVERY.island_surcharge: No surcharge mentioned, but delivery to some islands is handled by Hrvatska pošta and takes longer (3-5 business days).

PARCEL_SHOPS.pricing: €3.19 for orders up to €40. Free for orders over €40.

weekend_delivery.days: Deliveries to parcel shops are made Monday to Friday.

PARCEL_SHOPS.island_surcharge: No surcharge mentioned. Prices are valid for all of Croatia.

PARCEL_LOCKERS.pricing: €1.99 for orders up to €40. Free for orders over €40.

weekend_delivery.days: Packages can be picked up from the locker 24/7, including weekends.

PARCEL_LOCKERS.island_surcharge: No surcharge mentioned. Prices are valid for all of Croatia.

weekend_delivery.days: Pickup is available Monday to Friday, 09:00 to 16:00.

IN_STORE_PICKUP.cod_surcharge: Cash on delivery is not possible for in-store pickup. Payment must be made in advance online.

SUMMARY:
DELIVERY OPTIONS: The webshop offers several delivery methods for Croatia: home delivery via GLS, pickup at GLS PaketShop locations, delivery to BoxNow parcel lockers, and free personal pickup at their warehouse in Zagreb.
PROVIDERS: GLS and BoxNow.
PRICING: Delivery is free for all orders over €40. For orders under €40, GLS delivery (home or parcel shop) costs €3.19, and BoxNow parcel locker delivery costs €1.99. Personal pickup is always free.
DELIVERY TIME: The standard delivery time is 1-2 business days. For remote islands, it can extend to 3-5 business days.
NOTABLE FEATURES: The webshop emphasizes extremely discreet packaging. GLS provides SMS and email notifications with a 3-hour delivery window and allows customers to redirect packages to a parcel shop. BoxNow lockers are accessible 24/7 for package pickup. Cash on delivery is not available for personal pickup.
WEBSITE ASSESSMENT: The shipping information is comprehensive, clearly structured, and easy to understand. All delivery methods are explained in detail with pricing and timelines presented in a clear table. The only information not explicitly stated is the exact surcharge for cash on delivery, if any.
